oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Picking cotton near Huntington, Tennessee
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: This photograph shows a group of five laborers picking cotton in a field in the west Tennessee town of Huntington, Tennessee in Carroll County.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Cotton; Cotton farmers
